entry.title: [Global][OperatingSystem] - AlmaLinux 9 and Rocky Linux 9 unavailable for Tyan S8026GM2NRE-HOV-B boards
entry.content:
Jul 12, 17:09 UTC
Identified - Start time : 30/06/2023 00:00 UTC
Service impact : AlmaLinux 9 and Rocky Linux 9 can no longer be installed on Tyan S8026GM2NRE-HOV-B motherboards due to a kernel-related networking bug.
Root cause : A kernel update on AlmaLinux 9 and Rocky Linux 9.
Ongoing actions : Our team is monitoring the upstream bug report at https://bugzilla.redhat.com/show_bug.cgi?id=2222037
